concept.title: What is the Multiplication of numbers?
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is Multiplication of numbers.

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of multiplying numbers, you must know what is multiplication. The term "Multiplication" represents a mathematical operation. Multiplication is a process that you perform using numbers. It lets you find the product of two numbers. In the App, you must use the multiply (Ã—) button to perform the multiplication operation. In this process, we take a number and increase it to a larger value by combining it multiple times. We do this by multiplying one number by another to get the total product.
